price: Na mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume ili mpate kurehemewa.
footnotes: Na mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu, na mt'iini Mtume katika kila wanacho amrisha na kila wanacho kikataza ili mpate kurehemeka duniani na Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
